description: The Ragged Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Ragged Mountain for the snow report
Alexa, ask Ragged Mountain for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Ragged Mountain
shortDescription: The Ragged Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Ragged Mountain.
